---
title: "Getting Population Estimates for Cook County"
author: "Melanie McCord"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(censusapi)
```

```{r}
popest_housing <- getCensus(
  key = Sys.getenv("US_CENSUS_API_KEY"),
    name = "pep/housing",
    year = 2018,
    vars = c("DATE_CODE", "DATE_DESC", "HUEST"),
    region = "county:195",
    regionin = "state:02")
head(popest_housing)
```

```{r}
popproj <- getCensus(
    name = "pep/int_population",
    key = Sys.getenv("US_CENSUS_API_KEY"),
    vintage = 2002,
    vars = "SEX")
head(popproj)
```
